titleStmt.title: An advertisement to all learned gentlemen, June 21, 1690. There is newly published a book, intituled, Censura celebriorum authorum : sive, Tractatus in quo varia virorum doctorum de clarissimis cujusque seculi scriptoribus judicia traduntur ... Thomas-Pope Blount ...
titleStmt.author: Chiswell, Richard.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
